name: tokenuze
description: A CLI tool that summarizes token and cost usage from various LLM providers
readme:
# Tokenuze

Tokenuze is a CLI tool that summarizes token and cost usage from various LLM providers.
It scans session logs, aggregates token counts, and reports pricing.
The output is a table or JSON, suitable for dashboards.

## Requirements
- Zig 0.16.0-dev.1976+8e091047b or newer (if building from source)
- `sqlite3` in your `PATH` (for Zed and Crush providers)
- Network access to fetch remote pricing / uploading stats (optional)

## Supported Providers
- [Amp](https://ampcode.com/)
- [Claude Code](https://www.claude.com/product/claude-code)
- [Codex CLI](https://developers.openai.com/codex/cli/)
- [Crush](https://github.com/charmbracelet/crush): project-based (supports recursive crawling with `-r`)
- [Gemini CLI](https://geminicli.com/)
- [Opencode](https://opencode.ai/)
- [Zed](https://zed.dev/)

## Installation

- **Prebuilt binaries:** grab the latest release from the [Releases page](https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/releases) and put `tokenuze` on your `PATH`.
- **Build from source:** requires Zig 0.16.0-dev.1976+8e091047b or newer

```bash
git clone https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze.git
cd tokenuze
zig build -Doptimize=ReleaseFast  # binary will be in zig-out/bin/
```

## Quick Start

By default it will display daily usage across all providers since the beginning of time:
```bash
tokenuze
```

### Options

You can restrict what `tokenuze` displays by filtering by date
```bash
tokenuze --since 20250101 --until 20250107
```
Or requesting specific providers
```bash
tokenuze --agent claude --agent codex
```
And combine everything
```
tokenuze --agent claude --agent codex --since 20250101 --until 20250107
```

Use the `-r` or `--recursive` flag to enable recursive searching (supported by providers like Crush):
```bash
tokenuze --agent crush --recursive
```

By appending the `--sessions` flag you can display session usage instead of daily.

Using the `--json` flag will display the result as a JSON file, which can be pretty printed with `--pretty`.

If you are tracking the stats in a separate server you can append the `--upload` flag to send them there.

Finally, you can see all this information typing `tokenuze --help`.

### JSON Output Sample

<details>

```json
{
  "daily": [
    {
      "date": "Nov 25, 2025",
      "isoDate": "2025-11-25",
      "inputTokens": 248291670,
      "cachedInputTokens": 236782489,
      "outputTokens": 1188464,
      "reasoningOutputTokens": 749903,
      "totalTokens": 249489543,
      "costUSD": 55.88007429999999,
      "models": {
        "gemini-2.5-flash": {
          "inputTokens": 10992,
          "cachedInputTokens": 0,
          "outputTokens": 10,
          "reasoningOutputTokens": 79,
          "totalTokens": 11032,
          "costUSD": 0.0033225999999999998,
          "pricingAvailable": true,
          "isFallback": false
        },
        "gemini-3-pro-preview": {
          "inputTokens": 5664,
          "cachedInputTokens": 10521,
          "outputTokens": 1738,
          "reasoningOutputTokens": 2048,
          "totalTokens": 16781,
          "costUSD": 0.0342882,
          "pricingAvailable": true,
          "isFallback": false
        },
        "gpt-5.1-codex": {
          "inputTokens": 248275014,
          "cachedInputTokens": 236771968,
          "outputTokens": 1186716,
          "reasoningOutputTokens": 747776,
          "totalTokens": 249461730,
          "costUSD": 55.842463499999994,
          "pricingAvailable": true,
          "isFallback": false
        }
      },
      "missingPricing": []
    }
  ],
  "totals": {
    "inputTokens": 248291670,
    "cachedInputTokens": 236782489,
    "outputTokens": 1188464,
    "reasoningOutputTokens": 749903,
    "totalTokens": 249489543,
    "costUSD": 55.88007429999999,
    "missingPricing": []
  }
}
```

Missing pricing entries are listed under `missingPricing`.

</details>


## Extending
To add a new provider:
1. Create a new file in `src/providers/` and use the `provider.makeProvider` factory.
2. Implement a parser for the provider's log format that emits `model.TokenUsageEvent` objects.
3. Use helpers in `src/providers/provider.zig` for common tasks like JSON parsing and timestamp handling.
4. Register the provider in `src/root.zig` and expose a `loadPricingData` function for fallback pricing.
5. Add test fixtures in a new `fixtures/<provider>` directory and write unit tests in your provider's file.

releases.name: tokenuze 0.8.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* feat(cli): introduce --recursive flag and implement for crush by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/61


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.7.2...0.8.0

releases.name: tokenuze 0.7.2
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* refactor(provider): migrate synchronization to std.Io.Mutex by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/57
* refactor(io): migrate to explicit std.Io context by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/58
* refactor: introduce Context struct for dependencies by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/59
* fix(gemini): ignore explicit total tokens during session parsing by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/60


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.7.1...0.7.2

releases.name: tokenuze 0.7.1
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* fix(model): correct token usage cost and display calculation by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/56


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.7.0...0.7.1

releases.name: tokenuze 0.7.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* feat(cli): add --list-agents command to show agent data paths by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/50
* refactor(provider): use std.Io.Group for concurrent event collection by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/51
* refactor(crush): use io group for worker thread management by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/52
* refactor: sort missing model and pricing lists by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/53
* perf(opencode): use streaming io for message file parsing by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/54
* refactor(provider): move io context to parse runtime by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/55


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.6.1...0.7.0

## What's Changed
* ci: run tests during CI build on linux by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/46
* feat(model): add hyphen and basename model name variants by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/48
* feat(zed): resolve db path based on operating system by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/49


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.6.0...0.6.1

releases.name: tokenuze 0.6.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* feat(cli): add --sessions flag for session-level output by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/40
* feat: integrate zed editor usage collection by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/39
* feat(render): display session activity in local timezone by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/41
* feat(crush): add support for crush usage tracking by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/42
* feat(pricing): calculate token costs and resolve model rates by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/43
* feat(amp): implement usage data provider by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/44
* refactor(model): implement session sorting by last activity by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/45


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.5.0...0.6.0

releases.name: tokenuze 0.5.0
releases.body:

* feat(opencode): add opencode usage tracking support by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/37

releases.name: tokenuze 0.4.4
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* perf: introduce pricing cache to avoid redundant loading by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/35
* perf(provider): use threads for processing session files by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/36


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.4.3...0.4.4

releases.name: tokenuze 0.4.3
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* refactor(codex): store token count status as boolean by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/31
* refactor(gemini): process model and timestamp during field parsing by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/32
* refactor(claude): consolidate record processing context by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/33
* refactor(provider): stream usage events using event sink interface by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/34


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.4.2...0.4.3

releases.name: tokenuze 0.4.2
releases.body:

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.4.1...0.4.2

releases.name: tokenuze 0.4.1
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* refactor: streamline runtime phases by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/26
* feat(http): add streaming response handling by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/27
* refactor(providers): share more parsing utilities by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/28

releases.name: tokenuze 0.4.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* feat(cli): add dynamic log level control by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/21
* feat: add --table option for usage summary by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/22
* feat(model): implement flexible model pricing resolution by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/23
* feat(cli): introduce --json flag for output format by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/24
* feat: hide cache usage fields if totals are zero by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/25


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.3.0...0.4.0

releases.name: tokenuze 0.3.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* refactor(session): pre-scan directory and use indices for worker tasks by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/14
* refactor(pricing): move remote pricing logic to core by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/15
* refactor(cli): implement data-driven option parsing by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/16
* refactor: extract identity resolution functions by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/17
* refactor: centralize token usage json writing by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/18
* feat(session_provider): support date suffix model aliases by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/19
* refactor(providers): decouple session parsing logic by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/20


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.2.0...0.3.0

releases.name: tokenuze 0.2.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* feat(upload): include local timezone offset in upload payload by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/12
* feat: implement --tz option for timezone offset by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/13


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/compare/0.1.0...0.2.0

releases.name: tokenuze 0.1.0
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* feat: add support for gemini session usage by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/1
* feat: add support for Claude session usage tracking by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/2
* fix(claude): align usage totals with ccusage by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/3
* test: verify token usage parsing for all providers by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/4
* refactor(allocator): separate shared and thread-local allocators by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/5
* feat(cli): implement help output by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/6
* ci: add github actions workflows by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/7
* feat: calculate and display combined input tokens by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/8
* feat(cli): add --version flag to display build version by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/9
* feat: track and report token usage by session by @arrufat in https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/pull/11


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bfactory-ai/tokenuze/commits/0.1.0
